column5: Just wanted to share my excitement with you guys, I'm leaving for Terrace BC on Nov 4th thru the 7Th for a little business trip. Of course my rods and reels will be following me and I'll be able to squeeze 1 1/2 2 days of fishing for giant BC Steel.  I will post pics when I return.  Cheers  Pierre
Sounds great. Have a good trip and don't forget the camera!
